Lansing.Great Lakes Christian College:
Great Lakes Christian College (GLCC) is a four-year private Christian college in Delta Township, Michigan, west of Lansing. It was founded in 1949, and is supported by and affiliated with the Christian Churches and Churches of Christ.


== History ==
The school was founded as Great Lakes Bible College in 1949 at Rock Lake, Michigan, near Vestaburg, with a student body of 12.
